timeline.bodyText: was this tested with a GPU instance? Could be missing a few deps right?
timeline.author: mycpuorg
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,39 @@
+# Build Spec for AWS CodeBuild CI
+
+version: 0.1
+
+phases:
+  install:
+    commands:
+      - apt-get update
+      - apt-get install -y curl
+      - pip install pip -U
+      - pip install future
+      - pip install Pillow
+      - pip install pytest
+      - pip install wheel

replies.bodyText: The current plan for the CI is to only run it on CPU. Please point out any missing deps there.
replies.author: alexwong

replies.bodyText:
@alexwong Can we also add GPU tests as part of the CI build, we ran into many issues there earlier and want to make sure no regression items creep in with the fixes.
We can do this in two steps. First land the PR for the CPU CI and then add missing steps for GPU regression tests
replies.author: chauhang

replies.bodyText: Sure, can either of you approve this (or provide missing dependencies that should be added).
replies.author: alexwong
